Uses of Package
com.noctarius.borabora.spi.builder

  • Packages that use com.noctarius.borabora.spi.builder 
    Package Description
    com.noctarius.borabora.builder.encoder
    This package contains the builder classes to encode values into CBOR data items.
    com.noctarius.borabora.builder.encoder.semantictag
    This package contains the interface definitions for the Builder API com.noctarius.borabora.spi.builder for all built-in semantic tag data types.
    com.noctarius.borabora.builder.query  
    com.noctarius.borabora.spi.builder
    This package contains the semantic tag builder SPI, which can be used to provide support for additional, not builtin, semantic tag data item types.
    com.noctarius.borabora.spi.codec
    This package contains the SPI to implement additional, non builtin data types (based on semantic tags, as defined on the CBOR specification) but also includes a collection of the builtin data types (TagStrategies).
    com.noctarius.borabora.spi.io  
  • Classes in com.noctarius.borabora.spi.builder used by com.noctarius.borabora.builder.encoder 
    Class and Description
    BuilderStackPop
    The BuilderStackPop annotation is used to control the internal proxy stack creation while capturing the encoding flow when writing a semantic tag.
    BuilderStackPush
    The BuilderStackPush annotation is used to control the internal proxy stack creation while capturing the encoding flow when writing a semantic tag.
    TagBuilderConsumer
    The TagBuilderConsumer is used to collect and execute semantic tag builder calls against the actual writer.
  • Classes in com.noctarius.borabora.spi.builder used by com.noctarius.borabora.builder.encoder.semantictag 
    Class and Description
    BuilderStackPush
    The BuilderStackPush annotation is used to control the internal proxy stack creation while capturing the encoding flow when writing a semantic tag.
    TagBuilder
    The TagBuilder interface is the final point of every builder chain for semantic tag builders.
  • Classes in com.noctarius.borabora.spi.builder used by com.noctarius.borabora.builder.query 
    Class and Description
    BuilderStackPop
    The BuilderStackPop annotation is used to control the internal proxy stack creation while capturing the encoding flow when writing a semantic tag.
    BuilderStackPush
    The BuilderStackPush annotation is used to control the internal proxy stack creation while capturing the encoding flow when writing a semantic tag.
  • Classes in com.noctarius.borabora.spi.builder used by com.noctarius.borabora.spi.builder 
    Class and Description
    EncoderContext
    The EncoderContext supports encoding values into a CBOR stream.
    EncoderContext.EncoderFunction
    The EncoderFunction interface defines an encoder to bind and write a value to a certain location inside the generated CBOR stream.
    TagBuilderConsumer
    The TagBuilderConsumer is used to collect and execute semantic tag builder calls against the actual writer.
  • Classes in com.noctarius.borabora.spi.builder used by com.noctarius.borabora.spi.codec 
    Class and Description
    EncoderContext
    The EncoderContext supports encoding values into a CBOR stream.
  • Classes in com.noctarius.borabora.spi.builder used by com.noctarius.borabora.spi.io 
    Class and Description
    EncoderContext
    The EncoderContext supports encoding values into a CBOR stream.
